description: Primes that are congruent to 1 mod n, where n is the index of the prime.
comments: Based on problem by _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
formula: A087611(a(n)) = 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 11 2003a(n) = A000040(A023143(n)). - _Zak Seidov_, Feb 19 2015
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = forprime(p=1, nn, if (p % primepi(p) == 1, print1(p, ", "))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 08 2015
author: _Jud McCranie_
